room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Too easy if you've done other rooms - probably needed only 2 people to complete.

room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Great room, great experience, very friendly management and staff!We went to "Portal" room, atmosphere was great, everything is new, different style tasks, team work tasks were awesome, no old buggy locks, like in some other escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: We just tried "Portal" and it was challenging and a lot of fun. Great time with friends.

room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: I got to test the "Portal" room and it was amazing! Each puzzle is fair and definitely requires a group effort. I had a fun time figuring each puzzle with my friends even during the more difficult puzzle. The rooms are real immersive and creative.The staff members are courteous and was open to our groups feedback. I highly recommend this activity for team building or for anyone looking for something fun and new. I'm already planning my second trip so I can try the other rooms. 5 out 5 for sure going again!

room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Great! Enjoyed going with just my group and no strangers. Portal was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Portal" by Brain Drain in Chicago
review: Great room. My fianc√© and I did the Portal room and absolutely loved it. We do have to brag that we currently have the best time, we challenge anyone to beat our record. Great use of technology and elements we had never seen before in a room escape.
